laboratory_examinations.findings: The appendix is slightly dilated in size to approximately 7 mm (previously 4 mm), with surrounding inflammatory stranding and mild hyperemia. There is no evidence of retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy, free peritoneal air, fluid collection, or significant lesions in other abdominal organs.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Appendix size increased from 4 mm to 7 mm.
